subject: all the issues of the new yorker that aren’t the fiction issue
body: every summer when i receive the new yorker fiction issue, i’m thankful for all the issues of the new yorker that aren’t the fiction issue.\_\_\_PARAGRAPH\_BREAK\_\_\_
